post.author: 강윤정

comment.author: 고상호
comment.content: 아주 수준 높은 일을 하시는군요. 그렇지않아도 오늘 web service seminar에 다녀와서 알아야 될것이 너무도 많구나 하고 저런걸 어떻게 좇아가나 했는데 이런 일을 직접하시는 분이 옆에 계시는 군요. 이 전산수구는 그저 그런분이 부럽기만 하군요. 죄송합니다. 답은 못주고 지면만 차지해서.

post.content:
Is there anyone experienced implementation of Secure WebService using the WebSphere server and .Net client?
We use .net client for sending out the SOAP message signed by the client's certificate and WebSphere app server authenticating the SOAP request.
While testing this SOAP requests, for some reason, WebSphere app keep saying the SOAP body is not signed though it is actually signed by .net client.
The client created by java had no problem of exchanging the signed messages. This happens when .Net client program is used to send out the request.
Any comments will be appreciated.
post.title: Trouble in Secure WebService using WebSphere and .Net
